recipes.title: Recipes

new_recipe.same-ingredient: Impossible to add the same ingredient several times in the list.

myIngredients.delete-impossible: Cannot be deleted. This ingredient is present in a grocery list or in a recipe. Delete the shopping list or edit the recipe in order to delete the item.

myUnities.delete-impossible: Cannot be deleted. This unity is present in a grocery list or in a recipe. Delete the shopping list or edit the recipe in order to delete the item.

modal.delete-definitif: No going back will be possible.

firebase.wrong-connection: The password is invalid or the user does not have an account.
firebase.already-account: The email address is already in use by another account.
firebase.bad-email: There is an error in the email address. Please correct it. An email address is composed of alphanumeric characters and does not contain spaces or accented letters.
firebase.bad-password: The password must be 6 characters long or more.
